name: Birdseed (Prototype)
description:
Feed birds in this VR game.

This prototype was made during the Spring 48 Hour UW-Stout IGDA Game Jam. Further development will likely continue in the future.

This was only tested for use on the Vive, but would likely work with an Oculus Rift.

Credits:

  • Shane Yach (@tipsheda) - Programmer
  • April Lewer (@aprilonian)  - 3D Modeler, Texturer, Rigger, and Concept Artist
  • Nicole Fairchild (@nicolefairchill) - 3D Modeler, Texturer, and Concept Artist
  • Allan Seckora - 3D Modeler
  • Danielle Fairchild - Concept Artist
